courseDetails.title: Work from Home : Work Life Balance and Time Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Work-Life Balance and Time Management for Productive Remote Work
courseDetails.longDescription:
Discover the keys to thriving in a remote work environment with the comprehensive course, "Work from Home-Work Life Balance and Time Management." This course is designed to equip you with the essential skills and strategies needed to excel in a work-from-home setup, ensuring a harmonious integration of work and personal life.

In this course, you'll begin with an introduction that provides a clear definition of Work from Home (WFH) and offers an overview of the presentation. Gain a solid understanding of the concept and its implications, setting the stage for the topics to come.

Explore the advantages and disadvantages of WFH, understanding the benefits such as increased flexibility and the challenges including potential isolation and blurred boundaries between work and personal life.

Work-life balance takes center stage as you delve into its definition and importance in a WFH setting. Discover practical tips and strategies for achieving work-life balance, empowering you to establish boundaries, prioritize self-care, and create a healthy equilibrium between your professional and personal lives.

Effective time management becomes a crucial skill to master in WFH. Learn the definition of time management and its specific importance in a remote work environment. Explore strategies for prioritization, managing distractions, and implementing effective scheduling techniques to enhance productivity and achieve your goals.

Communication and collaboration in WFH present unique challenges. Identify these obstacles and gain insights into a range of tools and techniques for effective virtual communication and collaboration. Foster meaningful connections with colleagues and teams, ensuring seamless cooperation and productivity.

Recognize the significance of mental health and well-being in WFH. Understand the importance of maintaining a healthy mind and body while working remotely, and acquire practical strategies to promote and sustain your overall well-being.

By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive understanding of work-life balance, time management, communication, collaboration, and maintaining mental health in a WFH environment. You'll be equipped with the skills and knowledge to thrive in a remote work setup, ensuring a fulfilling and successful professional journey.
targetAudiences: Professionals transitioning to remote work
Freelancers and independent contractors
Managers and team leaders overseeing remote teams
Individuals seeking to improve work-life balance and time management in a WFH setup
Anyone interested in optimizing productivity and well-being in a remote work environment

courseDetails.title: Generative AI Unleashed: Exploring Possibilities and Future
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understanding the Power and Impact of artificial Intelligence in Generating Content
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unleash your creativity and explore the world of Generative AI in this comprehensive course. From fundamental principles to cutting-edge techniques, you'll gain hands-on experience with data-driven models that open up new realms of innovation.

In the first part of the course, dive into the fundamental principles of Generative AI, including Bayesian models and autoregressive models. Discover the power of Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) and Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to generate realistic and imaginative content. Gain insights into the role of reinforcement learning and transformers in driving advancements in Generative AI.

Next, explore a range of real-world applications where Generative AI is making its mark. From art and healthcare to gaming and the business world, witness how Generative AI is transforming industries with its potential for creative content generation, drug discovery, procedural content generation, advertising, and marketing.

Finally, delve into the ethical and societal considerations surrounding Generative AI. Understand the implications of AI-generated content, privacy concerns, and the rise of deepfakes. Get a glimpse into the future trends and emerging techniques that will shape the landscape of Generative AI.

Join us on this captivating journey to become a leader in the world of Generative AI, and unlock your creative potential through intelligent algorithms.

Guiding Recruitment Strategies: As the metaverse industry expands, companies will seek to attract top talent with the required expertise. The assessment serves as a valuable tool for evaluating potential candidates, enabling companies to identify individuals who possess the necessary skills and knowledge to drive their metaverse initiatives forward.

The Metaverse Expert Assessment serves as an invaluable resource for individuals looking to build a career in the metaverse industry. By acquiring expertise in metaverse development and marketing, individuals can position themselves for exciting and dynamic roles within organizations at the forefront of this transformative technology.

Technical Roles: Metaverse development requires a range of technical skills, including programming, virtual reality design, 3D modeling, and user interface development. The assessment provides a foundation for individuals seeking careers as metaverse developers, designers, or software engineers.

Research and Innovation: The metaverse is a frontier for innovation, offering exciting opportunities for research and development. The Metaverse Expert Assessment plays a vital role in unlocking opportunities for employees and companies within the metaverse industry. courseDetails.title: Stress management in 3D: Reduce stress and prevent symptoms.
courseDetails.shortDescription: An integrated and comprehensive approach to preventing and reducing stress
courseDetails.longDescription:
**LEARN THE ART OF LIVING ABOVE YOUR STRESS**

Feeling stressed out? If your daily life feels like a whirlwind of kids, career, chaos, and commitments, it’s time to take control. Taking care of yourself now, can reduce fatigue, prevent burn out and help you to stay calm when next the stressors hit.

The dictionary tells us that stress is a state of mental or emotional strain resulting from demanding circumstances but, of course, there is a zillion of those circumstances these days!

As such, it is safe to say that stress is an inevitable part of life for everyone. You could be stressed from work or from navigating life decisions, the list goes on and on. We either learn to manage stress or get consumed by it. This is why it is important to talk about stress management so that it doesn’t take control of your life and wreak havoc on your health.

Why concern yourself with stress management?

Did you know that stress is a powerful indicator of overall well-being?

Managing stress will lead to a happier, healthier, and more energized version of you. Stress management also helps with improving your mood, which in turn boosts the immune system, and promotes longevity.

In this course, you will learn:

The nature of stress and its common causes

  • the benefits of stress management

  • how to recognize stress symptoms in yourself and others.

  • How to tackle stress symptoms and common indicators, such as anxiety, depression, panic, poor sleep, poor wellbeing, low self-confidence, and low self-esteem.

  • the important models for understanding stress

  • How to reduce stress effectively through the 3D approach

Identifying and navigating work-related stress

  • How to spot the causes of work-related stress and deal with them

  • How to prevent and manage work-related stress

  • How to use your thoughts to reduce stress

  • Learning the various types of work-related stress

  • Stress management for productivity at work-place

Evading stress in your personal life

  • How to spot the causes of stress in your personal life

  • How to cope with stress in your personal life

  • the well-being triangles to help you understand and prevent stress

  • How to use your feelings relationships to reduce stress

  • How to use your body and behavior to reduce stress

  • And much more

Why do we get stressed?

Everyone experiences stress, but many don’t know how to manage it, meanwhile, unmanaged stress can have devastating effects some of which will be discussed below.

When major life stressors come up, it is important to handle them properly to avoid getting hurt. A questionnaire revealed that the top five most stressful life events are: death of a loved one, divorce, moving, major illness or injury, and job loss.

There is a very thin line between stress management and health management. After experiencing stressful life events, people often break down and fall ill. That is because accumulated stress can aggravate health challenges and other issues; for example, it may affect digestive health, inflammation, the immune system, bone density, sexual health, sleep, anxiety, etc. If you aren’t careful, stress may amplify ailments that were under control before.

Stress is normal but can be monitored.

It’s normal to feel stressed sometimes, but if you always feel under pressure, it can have negative impacts on your mind and body. This is because stress is supposed to be a short-term response to tension and not a constant state of being.

How does stress impact you?

Stress has a bigger impact on your health than you might realize. Stress plays a major role in how your body functions. It can affect your mood, your immune system, your neurotransmitters, and have a host of effects on your mental, physical, and emotional health. Stress can impact your brain all on its own, but it is worse when you don’t take care of your health.

Has your stress resulted in any of the side effects or symptoms of unmanaged stress that includes headaches, digestive problems, sleep issues, irritability, decreased productivity, problems with memory or with concentration, weight gain or loss, and increased blood pressure or heart rate?

Are you finding it hard to eat or stick to a diet? Stress can make it harder to stick to a diet or exercise routine, and often distracts people from their daily meditation regimens.

Did you know insomnia, under or overeating, irritability, and depression can all be triggered by stress, and these conditions then make illnesses and chronic diseases even worse? Stress can prolong certain diseases and conditions for years.

Additionally, Stress can contribute to several mental and emotional disorders including anxiety, phobias, and panic attacks. Emotional stress can make it difficult to focus, make decisions, think things through, or remember things. Stress may also cause irritability, making you easily frustrated and impatient with others, and can even contribute to depression, anger, feelings of insecurity, and relationship conflicts.

For some, they might lead to long-term problems such as Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, which is a condition of persistent mental and emotional stress.

Stress is not all bad if you manage it.

Hold on! Stress is not all bad if managed properly. Otherwise, what can you say about people who scaled difficult periods and experienced growth afterward? This phenomenon has even caught the attention of professionals and is now called Post-Traumatic Growth. How is it that these individuals come through the trauma with a positive response? And even more importantly, how can more of us experience this? That is where stress management and utilization come in.

Stress is a problem when it is constant or when the situation that brings about it goes out of your control. When the latter happens, it is important to know how to cope with stress.

Strategies you will learn that will help reduce stress include:

  • Relaxation

  • Sleep

  • Exercise

  • Visualization

  • Gratitude

  • Meditation

  • Reframing

  • Journaling

  • And much more


About the instructor:

The instructor is uniquely positioned to help you learn about stress management: As an organizational psychologist, He/she daily helps both individuals and organizations deal with stress - whether it be reducing unpleasant symptoms in the individual or making organizational changes to prevent stress, and/or improve employee wellbeing. The instructor regularly holds workshops, seminars, and courses on stress management. He/she often conducts one-on-one stress coaching sessions with leaders as well as their workers. He/she likewise engages in organizational stress management interventions where stress factors are investigated, and the best solutions are developed to prevent and reduce stress among employees.

Stress Management Course:

Stress is mutable and comes in different shades. It is unwise to learn all the types of stress possible; rather, it is better to learn how to adapt, adjust, and control stress and to utilize those skills in tackling stress regardless of its nature.

To this end, one cannot emphasize enough that you find what works for you!

It is helpful to find the methods of relaxation and self-care that work best for you. This course will teach you what to expect when confronted with stressful circumstances and prepare you so you’re ready to perform when stress arrives. You’ll also learn to accept the things that you can’t control.

This course is for everyone: men, women, nursing mothers, pregnant women, adults, and children.

Did you recognize any stress symptoms? Let’s start the journey of helping you to fix them now by enrolling in this course.

Have you been smacked down by stressful events, and you are finding a way to get yourself up again?

Do you need a strategy to manage your day-to-day activities?

Do you want to go from striving to survive?

This Stress Management course is for you.

Enrol today.
targetAudiences: Any one who wants to learn how to reduce stress symptoms fast.
Anyone who wants to understand how to prevent or manage stress
Any one who wants an in depth understanding of the causes and "cures" for stress

courseDetails.title: Build a Custom E-Commerce Site in React + JavaScript Basics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build a Fully Customized E-Commerce Site with Product Categories, Shopping Cart, and Checkout Page in React.
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course takes you step-by-step through the process of building a fully functional calculator in React. React, also known as React JS, is a powerful JavaScript library used for building custom, interactive user interfaces using UI components. Some of the most well known examples of organizations using React for their front-end include Netflix, Facebook, and Airbnb. Developed and maintained by Meta along with a community of independent developers, React remains free and open-source. React is a component based library built entirely on JavaScript, which makes it perfect for designing complex UI’s. With React, developers can build encapsulated components that efficiently manage their own state and render UI updates specifically when data changes. For example, think of the automated content refresh feature you see on a twitter feed, or facebook like button. Here the state of the UI component changes on the page, without having to manually refresh when the data is updated. This is just one small, yet powerful feature of React.

Through a complete hands-on project, this course will teach you all the fundamental principles of React that you must know to become a proficient React developer. We start right from the basics, including the tools needed to get started. From there we dive into JSX, functional components, props, callbacks, and various OnClick events. By this stage, the calculator will have a complete visual display, coupled with functional arithmetic operations. Students then move on to passing parameters in Callback functions, using the React State Hook, and debugging.

In addition to the hands-on React module, we also offer a comprehensive overview of JavaScript for those who need a refresher. Here we start with introducing students to the document object model (DOM) which defines the logical structure of HTML documents. From there we dive into JavaScript to demonstrate various methods in which DOM elements can be manipulated to add interactivity to static components. We start right from the basics, which includes JavaScript placement, and data output. From there we move on to variable declaration, arithmetic operations, operator precedence, data types, and objects. Once the foundations are covered, we move on to more complex operations using Arrays, Conditional Statements, JavaScript comparison operators, booleans and loops. Here students will learn to unleash the true power of JavaScript to render different outcomes based on user interaction. We will explore the use of functions to efficiently handle repetitive tasks and JavaScript events to handle output based on actions and occurrences. The section will conclude with a hands-on project where students will implement their knowledge to build a web based photo gallery and background color changer.
targetAudiences: Students interested in learning the Foundations of JavaScript
Students interested in learning the Foundations of ReactJS Library
Students interested in Building Interactive UI Components using React
Students interested in learning how to build a fully customized E-Commerce Site in React

courseDetails.title: Graphic Design Specialization - 4 in 1 Adobe software

courseDetails.longDescription:
Would you like to learn to make or build vector or audiovisual projects like a professional? In this 4 in 1 AulGEO courses, you will learn to meet your goals, you will see how to make products to be printed or digital. You will create projects from scratch, and you will enter the world of shapes, color and the basic characteristics of each of the programs that we have brought for you. This is a total comprehensive graphic design and illustration course using Adobe software. Includes Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe In Design and Adobe Premiere courses.


Adobe Illustrator is the preferred software for vector graphic illustration, with which you can make advertisements, logos, banners and other publicity within the field of graphic design. The course is developed gradually, including the basic functionalities of the menus, with practices in each section and a final project in which the different tools explained are applied.


Adobe photoshop is widely used for retouching images and photographs, but also for the creation of advertisements that, although they do not use vectors, can be created and edited with image-type treatment or interacting with Adobe Illustrator. This course includes both the functionalities of the software menus and their application to practical exercises and a complete project.


Adobe In Design is the software to layout magazines or newspapers in a professional way, for print, digital or even online edition. The course includes the layout of an edition of the real TwinGEO magazine, explaining how the functionalities shown above are applied.


Learn to edit your audiovisual projects with Adobe Premiere, you will know all the particularities and tools that Premiere offers to create videos. You will be able to learn the basic structure of the software and its relationship with other programs in the Adobe Creative Cloud suite. You will visualize and familiarize yourself with the interface, interact with color transitions, color and light corrections and effects, sound mixing and project export.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Business Administration
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Program in Management, Leadership, Business Administration, Project Management for CEO / C-level
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Executive Program in Business Administration


You will know about: business administration, its functions and focuses; how to manage material flows and human resources; what is organizational structure, its types and how to synchronize different departments; what is project management and its methods; setting goals and planning in organizations; what is ethic in business; logistic and its characteristics; how to develop organization


After finishing a course you will get: basic knowledge about business administration and, mainly, how to manage company, its processes at different levels


Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. Administrative management and the essence of Business Administration

3. Management of material and human resources

4. Organizational structure and synchronization of departments

5. Project management

6. Setting goals and planning in enterprise

7. Ethics of business

8. Business logistics

9. Organizational development management


Course Authors:

Igor Dmitriev

Education: I. MBA, The Boston University, USA, II. Master of Science at Engineering (Technical) Management, The State University of New York at Buffalo, USA, III. Six Sigma Black Belt

Expert at Banking (>16 years), FinTech & Digital (>12 years), Experienced Manager (>12 years) with successful track of records at personal and corporate entrepreneurship

More than 12 years at worldwide banking groups such us Societe Generale, Raiffeisenbank

Experience at roles: CEO, Head of Business, Chief Digital & Marketing Officer, Head of Digital Transformation and Channels, Head of Products and Marketing


Zhansaya Berdikulova

Education: Master of Economic Sciences of M. Auezov South Kazakhstan University.
Experience: Regional Coordinator of the leadership development projects, certified coach,
coach for the development of leadership qualities.


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.


Linked topics:

  • MBA

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Business Strategy

  • Management

  • Business Management

  • Leadership

  • Business Administration

  • MBA Master Degree preparation

  • CEO

  • Chief Executive Officer

courseDetails.title: Ethically Hack the Planet Part 4
courseDetails.shortDescription: Secure the world
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to embark on a thrilling journey through the realm of ethical hacking and cybersecurity, all while exploring the dynamic landscape of cloud computing and beyond? Welcome to "Ethically Hack the Planet Part 4, where we delve deep into the latest techniques, tools, and practices that will empower you to secure digital landscapes and protect sensitive data.


Course Overview:

This comprehensive course is designed to equip you with advanced knowledge and practical skills in cloud computing, containerization, penetration testing, and more. Each topic covered in this course is carefully selected to provide you with a holistic understanding of the modern cybersecurity challenges and ethical hacking solutions.


Course Highlights:

1. Cloud Computing: You will explore the intricacies of cloud computing, the backbone of modern IT infrastructure, and understand how to secure cloud environments effectively.


2. Cloud Service Models: Delve into the various cloud service models, such as IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, and learn how to make informed decisions based on your organization's needs.


3. Containers Basics: Discover the world of containerization and its applications, including Docker and Kubernetes.


4. S3 Bucket Enumeration: Master the art of discovering and securing exposed Amazon S3 buckets using tools like S3Scanner.


5. Ghost Tool: Uncover the secrets of Ghost Tool, a powerful ally in your ethical hacking toolkit.


6. Pentesting: Develop the skills to conduct penetration tests and vulnerability assessments to identify and mitigate potential threats.


7. OpenVPN: Learn how to set up secure virtual private networks for safe and encrypted communication.


8. TryHackme Part 1 and 2: Immerse yourself in the TryHackMe platform, an immersive environment to practice your hacking skills.


9. HOMOGRAPH Attacks: Explore the intriguing world of homograph attacks and learn how to protect against them.


10. Ransomware Defense: Gain insights into the insidious world of ransomware and discover strategies to defend against it.


11. Secure Yourself: Throughout the course, you will be equipped with the knowledge and tools to secure your own digital life.


Join us for "Ethically Hack the Planet Part 4" and become a formidable cybersecurity professional, ready to take on the challenges of the digital world while adhering to the highest ethical standards. Your journey to becoming a cyber guardian starts here!
targetAudiences: IT Beginners and for Ethical Hackers.

courseDetails.title: Accounting and auditing with artificial intelligence-Odoo 16
courseDetails.shortDescription: AI (artificial intelligence) improve workflow, efficiency, and accuracy by brining AI to your accounting systems.
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed to build your understanding of the emerging field of AI and help you consider the broader application of it through our work as professional accountants.


The term AI (artificial intelligence) seems to be part of every product or service description today. This course will define AI and its impact on accounting and workflow in today’s modern office. Throughout the course, you will learn what tools are available today to dramatically improve workflow, efficiency, and accuracy by brining AI to your accounting systems.


Artificial Intelligence (AI) is no longer just a theoretical concept! Instead, AI is a practical tool available today to help you address and solve real-world problems. In this course, you will learn about the fundamentals of AI and how you can put this amazing technology to work today to help you and your team work more efficiently and effectively.


Participate in this course to learn about the fundamentals of AI and specific types of problems AI can help you address. You will learn about AI features available in everyday applications – including Excel – and how you can use these features in situations such as detecting fraud and identifying potential errors in transactions. You will also learn how AI is changing how accounting and financial professionals work, both today and in the future.


The AI for Accountants digital short course has been created specifically for IPA members to enable you to first learn the basic concepts of Artificial Intelligence and secondly use your knowledge and understanding to apply in your practice through real world examples and interactive discussions.


UPON COMPLETING THIS COURSE, YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO:

The Role of AI in Accounting: Advancements and Opportunities

Identify key components of Artificial Intelligence

Differentiate between Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Robotic Process Automation

List examples of potential uses of Artificial Intelligence in accounting and financial environments

Identify instances of AI features in applications such as Excel

Automate in Finance & Accounts - Automation in Finance Function

Document Capture and Recognition for Financial Workflows

Frictionless Customer Onboarding

Robotic Process Automation + Intelligence (AI that automates business processes)

Internet of Things (AI that enables devices to communicate directly without human intervention)
targetAudiences: Commercial or industrial business owners
Restaurant and store owners
Financial and administrative consulting offices
Programmers and electronic systems developers

courseDetails.title: دبلوم  المراجع الداخلى المعتمد
courseDetails.shortDescription: كن مدققًا داخليًا محترفًا
courseDetails.longDescription:
من خلال امتلاك مجموعة المهارات اللازمة لإجراء عمليات تدقيق احترافية ، ستتمكن من التأثير على أولويات الشركة.

ستكون الشخص الذي يتم الاتصال به عندما تحتاج الشركة إلى التعامل مع تدقيق العملاء ، أو تدقيق الشهادات أو التحقق من مورد رئيسي.

معرفة كيفية إجراء تدقيق ، قادر على الكشف عن مشكلات الشركة والتعامل معها قبل أن يكتشف العميل أو مدقق الشهادات عنها ، أو منع الشركة من العمل مع المورد السيئ.

كن الشخص الذي يأتي إليه الجميع بشكل جيد للعملاء والمراجعين والموردين.

الشخص الذي يشارك في جميع العمليات.

كيف سيؤثر ذلك على حياتك المهنية؟

حدد الجودة المهنية التي تريد أن تصبح.

بالإضافة إلى دعم غير محدود عبر البريد الإلكتروني

لماذا تحتاج إلى مهارة تدقيق؟

يعد التدقيق الداخلي أداة وقائية ممتازة لتحديد المشكلات قبل حدوث التلف.

التدقيق غير الفعال هو إهدار للوقت والمال على المنظمة.

ولكن إذا كشف التدقيق عن أوجه القصور في الشركة وساعد في توفير تكلفة التشغيل ، فهذا بالضبط ما ستقدره الإدارة.

فقط تخيل التأثير الذي يمكن أن يحدثه على حياتك المهنية ، إذا كنت ستجري تدقيقًا فعالًا ، فسيؤدي ذلك إلى إحداث تغيير إيجابي.

إن امتلاك مجموعة المهارات اللازمة لإجراء تدقيق داخلي احترافي ، ليس فقط أفضل طريقة لعرض مهاراتك المهنية ، ولكنه أيضًا مفيد للغاية لتعزيز التغيير داخل شركتك وجعله أكثر ربحية.

لماذا هذه الدورة؟

هل تعلم أن الدراسات تظهر أنك ستنسى أكثر من 50٪ مما تتعلمه في غضون ساعة ،

وما يزيد عن 75٪ بنهاية اليوم؟

تشير هذه الدراسات أيضًا إلى أنك إذا مارست شيئًا ما ، وكلما فعلت شيئًا أكثر ، كلما تحسنت في ذلك ، وكلما تذكرت أكثر.

إذا كنت تبحث عن التعلم الحقيقي ، فهذه الدورة تحتوي على:

الكثير من التدريبات ، من الشركات الحقيقية ،

حلول للتمارين.

هنا سوف تتعلم حقًا ولن تمضي الوقت فقط.

تحتوي الدورة أيضًا على أمثلة ودراسات حالة.

بعض مواضيع الدورة:

أنواع التدقيق

مدة التدقيق والمحتوى الأمثل

كتابة خطة تدقيق

أفضل افتتاح للتدقيق على الإطلاق

علم النفس التدقيق

افعل أفضل خاتمة

التعامل مع الملاحظات على التقرير

وأكثر من ذلك بكثير…

كانت هذه هي الأسئلة التي طرحتها ، عند إجراء عمليات التدقيق الأولى ، وكل ما حصلت عليه كان إرشادات غامضة ، ولم يكن ذلك مفيدًا.

لذلك ، بعد أكثر من عقد ، وبعد إنشاء الآلاف من عمليات التدقيق ، قمت بإنشاء هذه الدورة التدريبية ، حتى لا يمر الآخرون بالصعوبات التي واجهتها.

تم تصميم هذه الدورة للمهنيين في مواقف الحياة الواقعية المختلفة ، الذين ليسوا بالضرورة متخصصين في التدقيق الداخلي ، ولكنهم يحتاجون ويرغبون في الحصول على فهم موجز ومنظم للتدقيق الداخلي.


أولاً ، تم إعداده لأعضاء مجلس الإدارة وإدارة المنظمات على مختلف المستويات. على سبيل المثال ، أنت عضو في مجلس إدارة أو لجنة تدقيق في مؤسسة ما وأنت مسؤول عن الإشراف على وظيفة التدقيق الداخلي. أو ترغب شركتك في الاستعانة بمصادر خارجية لوظيفة تدقيق داخلي وتحتاج إلى فهم المعايير للحصول على الخدمة بشكل صحيح. أو أنك تستعد للترقية أو لمهمة مؤقتة مع وظيفة المراجعة الداخلية.


الجمهور المستهدف الثاني هو المهنيين الذين يغيرون وظائفهم والذين يفكرون في الحصول على وظيفة في التدقيق الداخلي.


كما أنه سيفيد أولئك الذين يستعدون لاختبارات المدقق الداخلي المعتمد. إذا كنت تستعد لاختبارات المدقق الداخلي المعتمد  خاصة في نهاية التحضير الخاص بك ، فأنت ترغب في الاطلاع على مواد إضافية قد تنظر إلى الموضوع من زاوية مختلفة ، أو من منظور عملي أكثر.


ستتعرف في هذه الدورة على:

تعريف ونطاق التدقيق الداخلي ؛


المعايير المهنية التي تحكم التدقيق الداخلي.


كيف يعمل التدقيق الداخلي الاستعانة بمصادر خارجية والاستعانة بمصادر خارجية ؛


ما هي العناصر الرئيسية لعملية ومنهجية التدقيق الداخلي؟


كيفية هيكلة و / أو فهم تقارير ارتباط التدقيق الداخلي ؛

courseDetails.title: دبلوم محاسب تكاليف المطاعم المعتمد
courseDetails.shortDescription: مجموعة لا تقدر بثمن من المهارات والأدوات الإدارية التي ستعزز معرفتك بكيفية إدارة تكاليف الغذاء في صناعة المطاعم
courseDetails.longDescription:
طور مهاراتك في حساب تكلفة الطعام وتعلم كيفية تحسين أنظمة طلب الطعام وإدارة المطبخ.


لقد قيل أن هناك ثلاثة أنواع من المديرين: أولئك الذين يعرفون ما حدث في الماضي ، والذين يعرفون ما يحدث الآن ، والذين يعرفون ما سيحدث في المستقبل. من الواضح أن المدير الذي يمتلك الصفات الثلاث هو الأفضل استعدادًا للإدارة بفعالية وكفاءة. ستمنحك هذه الدورة الأدوات اللازمة للحفاظ على سجلات المبيعات والتكاليف (الماضي) ، وتطوير أنظمة لمراقبة الأنشطة الحالية (في الوقت الحاضر) ، وتعلم التقنيات المطلوبة لتوقع ما سيأتي (المستقبل).


ستزودك هذه الدورة التدريبية عبر الإنترنت بجميع المعلومات والأدوات المتعلقة بالتحكم في التكلفة والتي ستحتاج إليها لتحقيق مستويات النجاح التي تتناسب مع أعلى أهدافك المهنية. إذا كنت تعمل بجد وبذلت قصارى جهدك ، فستجد أن لديك القدرة على إتقان جميع المعلومات الموجودة في هذه الدورة التدريبية. عندما تفعل ذلك ، ستكون قد اكتسبت مجموعة لا تقدر بثمن من المهارات والأدوات الإدارية التي ستعزز معرفتك بصناعة إدارة الضيافة. ستضمن هذه المهارات والأدوات أن حياتك المهنية في مجال الضيافة ستكون مجزية لك على المستويين الشخصي والمهني

تعرف على كيفية التحكم في تكاليف طعامك مع إدارة أعمال مطعمك بشكل مربح

التحقيق في التكاليف المرتبطة بالإنتاج في صناعة المواد الغذائية

يعد التحكم في التكاليف في تقديم الطعام مهارة أساسية لضمان تشغيل المطبخ بشكل مربح.


ستتعلم أساسيات إدارة التكلفة في المطاعم وشركات تقديم الطعام وتكتشف كيفية تحسين عملياتك الحالية باستخدام المعرفة المالية التي اكتسبتها.


تعلم مبادئ التحكم في التكاليف في صناعة الخدمات الغذائية

تعد المعرفة السليمة بمصطلحات حساب التكلفة أمرًا حيويًا لضمان قدرتك على تشغيل مطبخك بفعالية ، من طلب المخزون إلى عناصر قائمة الأسعار.


في هذه الدورة ، سوف تتعرف على العديد من المصطلحات المالية والتشغيلية المستخدمة في عمليات حساب تكلفة الطعام. سيسمح لك ذلك بفهم عناصر تكلفة الطعام وتحسين الوظائف في نظام الإدارة الخاص بك.


ادرس كيفية إدارة تكاليف إنتاج الغذاء باستخدام الوصفات القياسية والتحكم في الأجزاء

من خلال فهم المكان الذي يمكن التحكم فيه في التكاليف ، ستكتشف طرقًا لإدارة النفقات العامة بما في ذلك عناصر التحكم في الأجزاء وتوحيد الوصفات.


باستخدام هذه المهارات ، ستتمكن من تقليل الفاقد وإضافة الاتساق إلى ضوابط المخزون.


اكتشف كيف تؤثر عناصر تكلفة الغذاء على صافي الربح وهوامش الربح الإجمالي

خلال هذه الدورة التدريبية ، سوف تكتشف مدى تأثير تكلفة الغذاء الدقيقة على عمليات إدارة المخزون وأنظمة الطلب ، وحتى حساب أسعار البيع.


بمعرفتك بعمليات حساب التكلفة في كل خطوة من خطوات الإنتاج ، ستتمكن من تحليل أرباحك وتقييم أين يمكن إجراء التغييرات لزيادة الربحية في المستقبل.


بنهاية هذه الدورة ، ستكون لديك معرفة أساسية بالتكاليف المختلفة المرتبطة بإنتاج الطعام في صناعة التموين. ستشعر بالراحة عند حساب التكاليف وتحليل المواضع التي يمكن تحسين العمليات فيها لتقليل النفقات العامة وتحسين الربحية.

courseDetails.title: Hashicorp Vault Management with Kubernetes via HELM
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Hashicorp vault fundamental on kubernetes by understanding the core concepts by deep diving internal architecture.
courseDetails.longDescription:
HashiCorp Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing

HashiCorp Vault is a tool that is used to store, process, and generally manage any kind of credentials. It removes the need for traditional databases that are used to store user credentials. Even though it provides storage for credentials, it also provides many more features. You will be able to create and revoke secrets, grant time-based access, IP-based access, and much more.

Vault comes with various pluggable components called secrets engines and authentication methods allowing you to integrate with external systems. The purpose of those components is to manage and protect your secrets in dynamic infrastructure (e.g. database credentials, passwords, API keys).

What you will learn in this course:

  • As an administrator or developer how to manage, deploy& configure Vault on kubernetes cluster

  • How to connect PODs/application with Vault via Injector

  • Deploy & manager Vault on Azure Kubernetes Cluster

  • Manage different components like secrets, users, policies and many more via UI/API/CLI

  • Champion Vault in less then 4 hours with ALL Demos

Course Agenda:

  • Course Introduction

  • Introduction to HashiCorp Vault

  • Learn the Vault Architecture easy way

  • Installing Vault on Kubernetes Cluster

  • Deploy Vault via HELM on Kubernetes cluster

  • Different Authentication Methods in Vault

  • Assess Vault via root Tokens

  • Create user authentication - manually & using for-loop

  • Write Vault Policies via UI/CLI/API

  • Create KV Secrets Engines

  • Manage Vault components via CLI, API, and UI

  • Automation entire deployment of Vault services

  • Real infrastructure example on how to manage HashiCorp Vault

  • Access HashiCorp Vault via Web-Based User Interface

  • HashiCorp Vault Authentication, Secrets, and Tokens

  • Write HashiCorp Vault Policies

  • Use HashiCorp Vault Application Programming Interface to automate administration

  • Authenticate Users via Vault
targetAudiences: Security Engineers
Vault Administrator
DevOps Engineer
Infrastructure Engineers
Developers

Assessment Description:

The Web3 expert assessment is a comprehensive evaluation designed to assess an individual's knowledge and expertise in the field of Web3 technology, blockchain, decentralized applications, and related concepts. This assessment is crucial for both employees and companies in the rapidly evolving landscape of decentralized technologies.


For Employees:

Skill Validation: By undertaking the Web3 expert assessment, employees can validate their skills and knowledge in Web3 technology. It demonstrates their competence in understanding blockchain, decentralized systems, smart contracts, and related topics, which are increasingly in demand in various industries.

Career Advancement: Becoming a certified Web3 expert can open up numerous career opportunities. With the growing adoption of Web3 solutions, companies are actively seeking professionals who possess the skills and expertise to develop and implement decentralized applications. This assessment can serve as a strong credential to advance one's career in this emerging field.

Industry Recognition: Achieving a high score or certification in the Web3 expert assessment showcases an employee's commitment to staying updated with the latest technologies and industry trends. It enhances their professional reputation and increases their chances of being recognized as an authority in the field.


For Companies:

Hiring and Recruitment: The Web3 expert assessment provides companies with a reliable benchmark to assess the proficiency and expertise of potential candidates. It helps in identifying individuals who possess the necessary skills to contribute to the development and implementation of Web3 solutions. This assessment enables companies to make informed hiring decisions and build a competent team of Web3 professionals.

Quality Assurance: Employing certified Web3 experts ensures a high standard of quality in the development and deployment of Web3 solutions. Companies can trust these professionals to possess a deep understanding of the underlying technologies, security considerations, and best practices. This leads to more reliable and robust implementations, reducing the risk of vulnerabilities or flaws.

Innovation and Competitive Edge: Web3 technology has the potential to revolutionize various industries by enabling new business models and enhancing operational efficiency. Having Web3 experts within the company ensures a deep understanding of these technologies, allowing companies to explore innovative solutions, adapt to emerging trends, and gain a competitive edge in their respective industries.


Web3 Solutions Development and Marketing for Career Building:

Proficiency in Web3 solutions development and marketing offers several career-building advantages:


Growing Demand: As Web3 technology gains traction, the demand for professionals skilled in Web3 solutions development and marketing is on the rise. Companies across industries are actively exploring the implementation of decentralized applications, tokenization, decentralized finance (DeFi), and more. Building expertise in these areas opens doors to exciting and well-paid career opportunities.

Early-Mover Advantage: Web3 is still an emerging field, and being an early adopter and expert in Web3 solutions development and marketing can provide a significant advantage. Early movers have the opportunity to shape the industry, contribute to cutting-edge projects, and establish themselves as thought leaders and influencers.

Diverse Industry Applications: Web3 technology has applications in various industries, including finance, healthcare, supply chain management, gaming, and more. By specializing in Web3 solutions development and marketing, professionals can explore career opportunities across different sectors, broadening their horizons and allowing for interdisciplinary collaboration.

Entrepreneurial Opportunities: The decentralized nature of Web3 technology encourages entrepreneurship. Skilled professionals can leverage their expertise to develop their own Web3-based applications, launch startups, or contribute to open-source projects. This opens avenues for innovation, creativity, and potential financial success.


The Web3 expert assessment holds significant importance for both employees and companies. For employees, it validates skills, aids career advancement, and enhances industry recognition. For companies, it assists in hiring top talent, ensuring quality assurance, and fostering innovation. Additionally, building expertise in Web3 solutions development and marketing offers individuals numerous career-building opportunities in an evolving and promising field.

courseDetails.title: Business Plan: Learn It Fast! - Business Planning & Writing
courseDetails.shortDescription: In 1 Hour You Can Learn How To Write A Comprehensive Business Plan. Ideal for those who want to get started quickly!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Updated: January 2022


                                                 Business Plan - Quick Start

If you are looking for a quick jumpstart into writing a comprehensive Business Plan then this course will help you achieve that goal. You can learn how to create a business plan in just one hour!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Let me explain

What makes this course different is that it summarizes all the important element that is necessary to write a great business plan and delivers it to you in a short; 1-hour training program. You will understand what to be included and how to structure your business in a way that helps you gain more confidence about your business. Also, this format has the capacity to persuade investors and other stakeholders to join your venture because the information will be presented in a logical step by step method.

========================================================================

The course can be very useful for:

  • Startups

  • Freelancers

  • Small business owners

(It is very practical for those who have limited time because they are currently running their business or in full-time employment)

========================================================================

This Comprehensive Business Plan format covers the following  5 Parts:

The course cover the five important elements that every business plan must have, gives direction on the content that should be documented and insight I have gained from writing over 40 business plans.

#1 Executive Summary - How to summarize your whole business plan into two pages in a concise interesting way

#2 The Marketing Plan -  “What I Want To Do" Road testing your product/service, understand how you will reach and market to your niche as well create the workable methods of scaling

#3 Operations Plan: “How I Am Going To Do It" – Focusing on the internal structure and organization of your business. This will include clearly documenting your Management, Business Structure, Staff –Insurances, Training Requirements etc

courseDetails.title: Kontrapunkt und Akkorde
courseDetails.shortDescription: Wie du mehrere Stimmen und Akkorde als Begleitung erstellen und benützen kannst.
courseDetails.longDescription:
ENTDECKE den SCHLÜSSEL zum Verständnis der mehrstimmigen Musik und zur Musiktheorie und überwinde deine Vorbehalte gegenüber Kontrapunkt und Akkordlehre.

DIESER KURS HILFT dir mit einer EFFEKTIVEN METHODE, einen umfassenden, tiefen Einblick in die Mehrstimmigkeit den Kontrapunkt und in die Akkorde zu gewinnen.

  • Ein außergewöhnlicher Kurs, der dich endlich die Regeln der mehrstimmigen Musik einfach und verständlich entdecken lässt.

Dieser Kurs ist anders als die üblichen Musiktheorie-Kurse.
Hier wird alles kompakt und wesentlich formuliert, es gibt keine Plauderei oder Leerlauf, alles ist logisch und systematisch aufgebaut, alles dient der Verständlichkeit und Nachvollziehbarkeit.

Du wirst hier die mehrstimmige Musik tief und gründlich und vor allem ganzheitlich verstehen, indem du ihre Kräfte und ihre Spielregeln kennenlernst.


All das wird sehr Praxis orientiert erklärt.

Zahlreiche Infografiken, Animationen und Hörbeispiele zeigen einfach und verständlich, wie alles aufgebaut ist und was du tun musst, um weiterzukommen.

Die konkreten Regeln werden gleich in die Praxis Schritt-für-Schritt umgesetzt, d. h., es wird gleich aktiv musiziert – einfache  Aufgabenstellungen machen dies möglich
Das schafft eine Brücke zu den Regeln.

In diesem Kurs sind alle Fähigkeiten und Informationen enthalten, die du zum erfolgreichen Erlernen des Kontrapunktes  benötigst. Der Kontrapunkt ist eine einfache, praktische Methode wie du mehre Stimmen erstellen und führen kannst. 

Ich möchte einfach, dass du so bald wie möglich selber mehrere Stimmen erstellen und führen kannst und die Akkorde kreativ einsetzen kannst.

Das ist nämlich das Ziel dieses Kurses: dass du aktiv mehrstimmige Musik machen kannst.

Du wirst kaum eine andere Gelegenheit bekommen, den Kontrapunkt, Akkorde und den Tonsatz so einfach und umfassend zu erlernen.

Die ausgezeichneten Erkenntnisse des österreichischen Komponisten und Musiktheoretikers Johann Fux bilden die Grundlage dieser Methode, "Kontrapunktlehre" , wie sie in diesem Kurs vorgestellt wird.

Dieses wertvolle Wissen über mehrstimmige Musik wird dir mit diesem Kurs zugänglich gemacht.

  • Am einfachsten und sichersten ist es die mehrstimmige Musik zu begreifen, indem du verstehst, warum sich die Stimmen auf bestimmte Weise verhalten welche Regeln und Kräfte sie gestalten.

  • Sobald du diese Konzepte verstanden hast, kannst du nachvollziehen, warum mehrere Stimmen und Akkorde auf ihre Art und Weise aufgebaut sind.

  • Wenn du das weißt, dann kannst du sogar deine eigenen Stimmen, sprich deine eigene mehrstimmige Musik erfinden!

Egal, ob du schon einmal über Akkordlehre gelernt hast oder gerade erst anfängst, dieser Kurs ist genau das Richtige für dich.

Dieser Kurs beinhaltet die wahrscheinlich einfachste und gleichzeitig effektivste Lernmethode über den Kontrapunkt, die es auf dem Markt gibt.

Dein musikalischer Erfolg liegt in deiner Hand.

Starte jetzt mit dem Kurs!
targetAudiences: Musikliebhaber mit Anfängerkentnissen die Mehrstimmige Musik verstehen und erstellen wollen.

courseDetails.title: Adeus Windows! Curso Completo de Linux Desktop —Iniciantes—
courseDetails.shortDescription: Sobre: Segurança, Performance, FHS, Principais Comandos, ufw Firewall, Oracle VirtualBox, Flatpak, Estilizar o Linux =)
courseDetails.longDescription:
O que é Linux?

Assim como o Windows, iOS e MacOS, o Linux é um sistema operacional. De fato, uma das plataformas mais populares do planeta, por exemplo, o Android é um sistema operacional Linux usado em celulares, mas também há versões para desktop (ensinada neste curso), servidores e outros dispositivos. Atualmente (2023) são mais de 600 opções de Linux que você pode escolher.

Por que devo aprender Linux?

Diferentemente do Windows, você não precisa ter um PC caro para rodar novas versões Linux, um computador com menos de 1GB de RAM pode rodar satisfatoriamente um navegador de internet e uma planilha compatível com Excel, por exemplo. A grande questão é que os bons sistemas Linux são rápidos, seguros e gratuitos!

Quem usa o Linux?

  • 47% dos desenvolvedores profissionais usam sistemas operacionais baseados em Linux. (Statista)

  • O Linux alimenta 39,2% dos sites cujo sistema operacional é conhecido. (W3Techs)

  • O Linux alimenta 85% dos smartphones. (Hayden James)

  • Linux é o terceiro sistema operacional de desktop mais popular, dentre eles, é o único totalmente gratuito. (Statista)

  • Os 500 supercomputadores mais rápidos do mundo são executados no Linux, pois são mais confiáveis. (Blackdown)

  • 96,3% dos servidores que custam mais de US$ 1.000.000,00 (um milhão de dólares) estão executando Linux. (ZDNet)

O que aprenderei nesse curso?

Este curso foi criado para que usuários de Windows possam migrar para Linux. Para isso, será usado um processo (passo a passo) que facilitará sua adaptação no Linux, mesmo sem conhecimentos avançados no novo sistema operacional.

O que este curso tem de diferente dos demais?

Este não é apenas um curso de “como usar Linux”, é um processo estruturado de forma que você vai se adaptar ao novo sistema. Este treinamento foi desenhado para você usar o Linux no seu dia a dia, aproveitar os benefícios da tecnologia, mas sem exigir que você domine completamente os comandos Linux, pois permite uma adaptação gradual ao novo sistema.

Obs.: Usuários que já tentaram usar Linux, se frustraram e acabaram voltando para Windows, fiquem tranquilos, dessa vez você vai conseguir! =)

Como são as aulas?

O treinamento é composto por 80% de aulas práticas, passo a passo. As aulas teóricas representam 20% do curso, onde são explicados conceitos importantes para novos usuários de Linux.

Este curso me tornará um administrador de Linux?

Não. Este curso tem foco no usuário Desktop e não na formação de um administrador Linux, mas é um caminho inicial ideal para quem deseja tornar futuramente. Um administrador Linux precisa de um grande conhecimento sobre serviços, protocolos de rede, gerenciamento diversos tipos de acessos, entre outras operações avançadas, estas tarefas não são o foco deste treinamento.

O que é um terminal Linux? Vou aprender a usar?

Terminal (ou shell) é um software onde você digita comandos para executar as tarefas sem precisar usar mouse, botões e janelas. Sendo um curso de Linux, obviamente, será ensinado sobre a Estrutura de Arquivos Linux (FHS) e, execução de comandos essenciais no terminal.

Como é a interface gráfica do Linux usado neste curso?

Usaremos o Linux Ubuntu, que é uma das distribuições Linux mais estáveis e confiáveis do universo Linux, o Ubuntu possui imensa quantidade de recursos operacionais gráficos, que permite a um usuário de Windows se adaptar com facilidade ao novo sistema.

Vou aprender coisas avançadas neste curso?

Neste treinamento você também vai entender e praticar assuntos avançados como Virtualização em Linux, aprendendo o conceito, instalação e configuração de máquinas virtuais no Linux Ubuntu, utilizaremos o poderoso Oracle VirtualBox neste processo.

O que preciso saber antes de fazer este curso?

Estar habituado ao uso de Windows ou outro sistema operacional como macOS já é o bastante.

Quem é o professor?

Prof. Arnaldo Sousa, formado em Engenharia de Software e apaixonado pesquisas tecnológicas. Foi instrutor oficial IBM e Sun Microsystem (criadora do Java, atual Oracle), é professor licenciado, especializado em docência, neuroaprendizagem e educação especial. Com larga experiência de uso e ensino de novas tecnologias em grandes corporações, o professor vai lhe apresentar o Linux de uma forma extremamente compreensível!
targetAudiences: Iniciantes em Linux;
Usuários de Windows ou macOS;
Aqueles que desejam facilidade de uso, segurança e performance Linux, mas não querem aprofundar-se nos comandos de terminal;
Pessoas que gostariam de migrar de Windows para Linux mas tem medo de não conseguir;
Aqueles que desejam usar o Linux como Desktop/Workstation;
Pessoas que já tentaram e não conseguiram usar o Linux como sistema operacional no dia a dia.

instructors.name: Arnaldo Sousa - IBM Former Instructor | CKA | CKAD | Helm | Desenvolvimento web | Terraform

courseDetails.title: Diploma in Music Therapy - in an hour (+14 hours study!)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma in Music Therapy: Using Sound to Heal
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is ONLY an hour long but there is a heavy emphasis on participation, student input, sharing of ideas and experiences so the course may actually be a whole lot longer!

The course begins with a brief introduction to music therapy and its benefits, followed by an overview of the theoretical frameworks that underpin music therapy. This includes an explanation of how music can be used to address physical, emotional, cognitive, and social needs. In particular there is an emphasis on the practical experience of one of the Instructors - an accomplished musician with qualifications in NLP and Music Therapy as well.

The majority of the course is devoted to demonstrating different techniques and approaches used in music therapy, such as improvisation, songwriting, and receptive listening. Each technique is explained in detail, along with examples of how they have been used successfully in real-life situations. The course also includes case studies of successful music therapy interventions and a discussion of the challenges and limitations of this form of therapy. This not a course that just sings tyhe praises of this form of therapy - there is a lecture on the downsides too.

The course concludes with a recap of the key points covered and an encouragement to seek further training or information if participants are interested in pursuing music therapy as a career or for personal use.

Overall, the goal of the course is to provide a basic understanding of music therapy and its potential benefits, while also highlighting some of the techniques and approaches used in this form of therapy.

Make sure you read the regular Educational Announcements and engage in discussions in the Q/A !
targetAudiences: Everyone interested in broadening their understanding of therapeutic techniques
Budding songwriters!
Everyone thinking of studying music therapy
Anyone stressed

courseDetails.title: Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing-101
courseDetails.shortDescription: Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing, Human resources, HRM, HRD, Recruitment and Inteviewing skills
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing 101

In today's rapidly changing world, diversity and inclusion have become essential aspects of any successful organization. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive workforce is not just a moral imperative; it's also a strategic advantage. Yet, despite the best intentions, unconscious bias can creep into the hiring process, undermining these efforts. This is where the "Master Course in Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing 101" comes into play. In this 101 course, we'll explore the significance of this course and its foundational principles.

Understanding Unconscious Bias

Before diving into the course itself, it's important to understand what unconscious bias is. Unconscious bias refers to the attitudes or stereotypes that affect our understanding, actions, and decisions in an unconscious manner. These biases can be based on various factors, such as race, gender, age, or other personal characteristics. In the context of recruiting and interviewing, unconscious bias can manifest in the form of preference for candidates who resemble those who currently work in the organization or in making judgments based on stereotypes.

The Master Course in Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing 101

This course is designed to provide an introductory understanding of unconscious bias in the context of recruitment and interviewing. It's the first step for HR professionals, hiring managers, and recruiters who want to foster diversity and inclusion in their organizations. Here are the key components of the course:

1. Defining Unconscious Bias: Participants will gain a comprehensive understanding of what unconscious bias is, its implications, and how it impacts the hiring process.

2. Recognizing Bias: The course helps individuals recognize and identify instances of unconscious bias in real-world recruitment scenarios.

3. Impact on Decision-Making: Participants will learn how unconscious bias affects decision-making, including candidate screening, interviewing, and final selections.

4. Mitigating Bias: Practical strategies and techniques will be shared to mitigate bias during the hiring process, including designing job descriptions, reviewing resumes, and conducting interviews.

5. Inclusive Hiring Practices: The course will introduce participants to inclusive hiring practices, which are designed to attract diverse talent and reduce bias in the recruitment process.

6. Evaluating Diversity Metrics: Understanding how to measure and assess diversity metrics to track progress and adapt strategies as needed.

Why This Course Matters

1. Improved Decision-Making: By recognizing and addressing unconscious bias, organizations can make more objective hiring decisions, resulting in a diverse and innovative workforce.

2. Better Employee Retention: When candidates are hired based on merit rather than bias, they are more likely to thrive in the workplace, leading to increased employee satisfaction and retention.

3. Enhanced Reputation: Companies that actively combat unconscious bias are more likely to be perceived as inclusive and attractive to top talent.

4. Legal Compliance: Unconscious bias in hiring can lead to discrimination claims. This course helps organizations avoid legal pitfalls by adhering to fair hiring practices.

The "Master Course in Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing 101" is the foundational step towards creating an inclusive, diverse, and forward-thinking workforce. By educating HR professionals, recruiters, and hiring managers about the impact of unconscious bias and providing practical tools to mitigate it, this course helps organizations stay ahead in a rapidly evolving world. In a time when diversity and inclusion are vital for success, it's an investment that pays off not only in terms of better hiring decisions but also in building a stronger and more innovative workforce.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 7 major topics:
1. Introduction to Unconscious Bias &The Psychology of Bias

2. Legal and Ethical Considerations and Self-Awareness and Bias

3. Bias in the Hiring Process

4. Mitigating Bias in Recruitment

5. Creating Inclusive Hiring Practices

6. Best Practices and Case Studies

7. Action Planning and Next Steps

Enroll now and learn today !
targetAudiences: All UG and PG Business, HRM, HRD students, company human resource executives and business leaders
Interested students to learn the concepts about the Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting & Interviewing-101

courseDetails.title: Nice Guy Syndrome Recovery & Social Confidence Building
courseDetails.shortDescription: Grow more confidence and build better relationships by improving your social skills and learning how to be bold.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Grow more confidence. Build better relationships. Boost your social skills. Learn how to transform from an unhappy people pleaser into a confident beast.


Do you wish you could be more confident and hold better conversations?

Are you forever seeking approval from others to feel better about yourself?

Are you sick of dealing with bad relationships and unfulfilling friendships?


If you answered “Yes” to the above, you likely suffer from Nice Guy Syndrome.


What is “Nice Guy Syndrome”?


Nice Guy Syndrome, also known as people-pleasing, is a condition often associated with toxic relationships, a constant feeling of neediness, and a debilitating lack of social confidence.


In an effort to evade rejection, avoid disapproval, and prevent conflict, we lose who we really are.


This course is the cure for Nice Guy Syndrome.


You’ll learn how to let go of your need for others’ approval, feel confident around anyone, and live a life defined by integrity and unshakeable self-belief.

  • Help you develop bullet-proof confidence.

  • Break down the barriers preventing you from living a fulfilling life.

Dan’s course is designed to transform you into an honest, brave, emotionally healthy, responsible, and 100% AUTHENTIC version of yourself.

Make no mistake: this course is confronting.


Recovering from Nice Guy Syndrome involves healing the childhood wounds that brought you here. There is no comfortable way to do this, but it must be done if you wish to live a life that brings you real joy and purpose.

Entdecke die Welt der Töne!


Willst du die Sprache der Musik erlernen?

Daher solltest du als erstes dein Gehör ausbilden, wenn du die musikalische Sprache sprechen willst.

Das bekommst du:


  • Eine praktische Methode zeigt wie du dein Gehör effektiv und schnell bilden kannst.

  • Du bekommst eine Schritt-für-Schritt- Anleitung, die du sofort umsetzen kannst.

  • Du wirst in kurzer Zeit, anhand der Anleitung notierte Melodien vorsingen können.


Kurs-Beschreibung


Mit welcher Methode kannst Du dein Gehör am besten bilden?

Du musst kein Instrument spielen, damit Du Dein Gehör trainieren kannst.

Es gibt einige Gehörbildungskurse, Videos und Softwares.

Bei denen muss man nur zuhören.

Am besten und gründlichsten lernst Du aber, wenn du mitsingst.

So bist du am Lernprozess aktiv beteiligt und lernst am effektivsten und schnellsten.


Weil du dein Gehör auf Klangmuster programmierst und diese abrufst in dem du singst.

Wenn du schon ein Instrument spielst, kannst du  einfach jetzt anfangen nebenbei dein Gehör zu bilden!


Probiere diese Methode aus, du wirst merken wie gut dein Gehör sich entwickeln wird.

Du wirst so die Musik mit anderen „Ohren“ wahrnehmen.

Ich zeige dir viele Grafiken, die deinem Gehör helfen werden.

Du wirst noch nebenbei also neben Gehörbildung das Notensystem und das Noten lesen von Grund auf kennen und verstehen lernen.

Für ein besseres Verständnis sorgt am Ende eines jeden Kapitels eine notierte Melodie, die du dann vorsingst. 

So kannst Du das erlernte Wissen gleich anwenden!

Das ist ein Zielorientierter Lehrgang, der dein musikalisches Gehör auf eine natürlichen Weise bildet


Das wirst du lernen:

  • Du wirst das musikalische ABC, die Tonstufen nach Gehör erkennen, benennen und singen können.

  • Du wirst in kurzer Zeit, anhand der Anleitung die notierte Melodien vorsingen können.

  • Du wirst die Intervalle nach Gehör erkennen können und sie in ein System einordnen.


Der Kurs ist ein methodisch aufbauender Weg zur Entwicklung des musikalischen Gehörs.


Anforderungen:

  • Voraussetzung ist ein Smartphone/Tablet

  • Ein einfaches Lied wie z.B Happy Birthday singen oder summen können.

Entdecke die Welt der Töne hörend!


Starte jetzt mit dem Kurs!

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0 (101 level)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Blockchain Adoption, Blockchain Technology, Cryptocurrency, Cryptography and Security, DApps, Bitcoin, Blockchain system
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0: Navigating the Future of Decentralized Technologies

Blockchain technology has come a long way since its inception. From its humble beginnings as the underlying technology behind Bitcoin, it has evolved into a disruptive force with the potential to transform industries and redefine the way we conduct business. Blockchain Adoption 2.0 represents the next phase of this transformative journey. In this master course, we will explore the concept of a Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0, and why it's essential for professionals looking to stay ahead in this rapidly evolving field.

The Evolution of Blockchain Adoption

Blockchain Adoption 2.0 builds upon the foundation of the first wave of blockchain adoption, which primarily focused on cryptocurrencies and financial services. It witnessed the rise of numerous blockchain-based startups, Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs), and significant media attention. However, this initial excitement was followed by a reality check, as it became apparent that mass adoption required more than just cryptocurrencies.

Blockchain Adoption 2.0 recognizes the need to integrate blockchain into mainstream industries, such as supply chain, healthcare, logistics, and government, while also addressing issues like scalability, sustainability, and interoperability. To achieve this, a Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0 is essential for those seeking to leverage the full potential of blockchain technology.

The Key Components of a Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0

1. Advanced Technical Knowledge: This course should provide in-depth technical knowledge about blockchain, including its various implementations, such as Ethereum, Hyperledger, and Corda. Understanding consensus algorithms, smart contracts, and the technical challenges of blockchain is crucial.

2. Practical Use Cases: Learning from real-world use cases is invaluable. Students should be exposed to successful blockchain implementations across different industries to gain insights into how blockchain can solve complex problems.

3. Regulatory and Legal Aspects: As blockchain technology matures, regulatory and legal considerations become increasingly important. A Master Course should include modules on the legal framework, compliance, and privacy concerns related to blockchain.

4. Sustainability and Scalability: Given the environmental concerns surrounding blockchain and the need for scalability, a course should explore energy-efficient consensus mechanisms and strategies for handling high transaction volumes.

5. Interoperability: Students should learn about the importance of interoperability in creating a connected blockchain ecosystem. This includes understanding cross-chain communication and compatibility.

6. Cybersecurity: The security of blockchain networks is paramount. A Master Course should delve into the best practices for securing blockchain applications and networks.

7. Blockchain Governance and Decision-Making: Governance models for blockchain networks are evolving. Students should learn about the various governance structures and decision-making processes within blockchain ecosystems.

8. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs): DeFi and NFTs have become significant blockchain use cases. A Master Course should cover these trends comprehensively.

Why a Master Course is Crucial

1. Stay Ahead of the Curve: The blockchain space is continually evolving. Staying up to date with the latest developments is essential to remain competitive in the job market.

2. Career Opportunities: Blockchain expertise is in high demand across various industries. Completing a Master Course can open doors to exciting career opportunities in fields like blockchain development, consultancy, and research.

3. Networking Opportunities: Master Courses often provide opportunities to connect with like-minded professionals, industry leaders, and experts. Building a strong professional network can be invaluable.

4. Problem-Solving Skills: Blockchain technology can solve complex problems. A Master Course equips students with the knowledge and skills to identify and address these challenges.

Blockchain Adoption 2.0 represents the next phase of blockchain's evolution, focusing on mainstream integration and overcoming the technical and regulatory challenges that have held it back. A Master Course in Blockchain Adoption 2.0 is a critical step for professionals looking to excel in this field. It provides the knowledge, skills, and insights needed to navigate the future of decentralized technologies successfully. As blockchain continues to revolutionize industries, those who invest in their education and expertise will be at the forefront of this exciting transformation.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 8 major topics:

1. Introduction to Blockchain Technology

2. Cryptography and Security

3. Smart Contracts & Decentralized Applications (DApps)

4. Blockchain Platforms and Ecosystems

5. Blockchain Use Cases and Regulatory and Legal Considerations

6. Blockchain Integration Strategies

7. Implementation and Deployment, Monitoring and Maintenance

8. Future Trends and Innovation & Capstone Project

courseDetails.title: IFIC Investment Funds in Canada Exam Preparation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Pass the IFIC or IFC exam in the smart way!
courseDetails.longDescription:
What is the IFIC Certification?


The IFIC course is a requirement to work in the banking sector in Canada. Once you pass the exam, you are eligible to be registered as a Mutual Fund Representative in a bank. You can advise clients on how to invest their money by recommending suitable mutual funds. Some banks hire candidates without the IFIC and you must pass it within 3-6 months. Others hire only qualified employees.


Can I work from home after passing the IFIC exam and getting hired?


Yes, some companies are providing online client appointments for investment advice. So it is possible to work from home.


Can I work in the back office after completing the IFIC?


If you don't like sales or want to work in mutual fund and investment processing back-office, it is possible, the pay rate is 17-23 dollars/hr


What's the pay rate for client-facing jobs with an IFIC certification?


In Canada, for a financial advisor, it could be around 25 to 30 dollars/hr. So on the low end, it could be 50K annually before taxes and deductions. On the high end, you may reach 100K before taxes with bonuses and performance incentives.


How do I enroll in the exam from a provider?


Visit the Canadian Securities Institute or IFSE websites for details. Both IFIC and IFC are equivalent in the banks.


Why should I enroll in your exam preparation course?


The topics in each chapter are explained in an easy-to-understand manner. You will save time and effort by reviewing the videos. You can study at your own pace. The price for the videos is much cheaper than hiring a tutor or attending a seminar.


What is covered in the IFIC Exam preparation course?


These exam preparation videos cover the topics in both the CSI, IFIC/IFC, and IFSE courses

The following topics and chapters are covered in this course:


1. The role of the mutual fund sales representatives.


2. The overview of the Canadian Financial Marketplace.


3. Economic principles.


4. Getting to know the client; how to recommend suitable investments.


5. Behavioral finance - how clients decide what to invest in


6. Tax and retirement planning


7. Types of Investment Products and How They Are Traded


8. Constructing Investment Portfolios


9. Understanding Financial Statements


10. The Modern Mutual Fund


11. Conservative Mutual Fund Products


12. Riskier Mutual Fund Products


13. Alternative Manages Products


14. Understanding Mutual Fund Performance


15. Selecting a Mutual Fund


16. Mutual Fund Fees and Services


17. Mutual Fund Dealer Regulation


18. Applying Ethical Standards to What You Have Learned

The videos are narrated with PDF summary slides that describe the topics in an easy-to-understand manner. The reference book is 444 pages and has a lot of detail. This summary of the course focuses on the main aspects that are expected in the exam, as well as the knowledge that is required to provide clients with a high level of knowledge and experience.
